name: Raspberry Mango Yogurt
description: This Raspberry Mango Yogurt is a delightful mix of tangy raspberries and sweet mangoes blended into creamy Greek yogurt. Perfect for those following low-carb, low-sodium, and low-sugar diets, this healthy recipe is an excellent choice for anyone looking to enjoy a nutritious and delicious treat.

recipeInstructions.text: Place the Greek live yogurt into a mixing bowl.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Add the frozen raspberries, flaxseeds, chia seeds, and raw mango pieces to the bowl.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Mix all the ingredients thoroughly until well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Chill the mixture in the refrigerator for about 30 minutes to allow the flavors to meld.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Serve the yogurt in a bowl or glass of your choice.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5
